ElementTagName.summary:
The tagName read-only property
of the interface returns the tag name of the element on which
it's called.

remarks.para:
For example, if the element is an img, its
tagName property is "IMG" (for HTML documents; it may be cased
differently for XML/XHTML documents).

ElementTagName.value:
A string indicating the element's tag name. This string's capitalization depends on the
document type:For objects, the value of tagName is the same as
the value of the property the element object
inherits from .
